BibleStudyGui::UISearchWidget

BibleStudyGui::UISearchWidget Class Reference

This class represents a collection of widgets which provide a text input field to input a search string and a button to start the search. More...

Detailed Description

This class represents a collection of widgets which provide a text input field to input a search string and a button to start the search.
